data.id: Code for Philly/Tools for Sealing and Expunging Criminal Records in Pennsylvania

links.self: /organizations/Code for Philly/projects/Tools for Sealing and Expunging Criminal Records in Pennsylvania.json

attributes.description: Community Legal Services is a private nonprofit that provides civil legal representation to thousands of low-income Philadelphians every year. CLS's Employment Unit helps clients' secure employment by expunging and sealing criminal records. CLS also maintains the Expungement Generator, a web application that nonprofits across the state use to automate creating and filing expungement petitions.
attributes.name: Tools for Sealing and Expunging Criminal Records in Pennsylvania
